Class AppointmentDB

java.lang.Object
database.Database<Appointment>
database.AppointmentDB
public class AppointmentDB extends Database<Appointment>
A database class to manage Appointment objects. Handles CRUD operations and provides methods to interact with appointment data, including loading and saving to a CSV file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AppointmentDB()
    Constructs an AppointmentDB instance and initializes the list of appointments.
